title: BRIEF-Contemporary Amperex Technology's Unit Signs Agreement To Buy 8.5% Stake In Pilbara Minerals
text:
BRIEF-Contemporary Amperex Technology's Unit Signs Agreement To Buy 8.5% Stake In Pilbara Minerals

Commodities 54 minutes ago (Sep 04, 2019 14:00)

BRIEF-Contemporary Amperex Technology's Unit Signs Agreement To Buy 8.5% Stake In Pilbara Minerals Sept 4 (Reuters) - Contemporary Amperex Technology Co Ltd : * SAYS ITS HONG KONG UNIT SIGNS AGREEMENT TO BUY 183.3 MILLION SHARES, OR 8.5% STAKE, IN PILBARA MINERALS FOR A$55.0 MILLION ($37.15 million)

BRIEF-Contemporary Amperex Technology's Unit Signs Agreement To Buy 8.5% Stake In Pilbara Minerals
